attributes.action: Wrong accusations on Islamic Boarding Schools across the UK
attributes.additional_details: Islamic Schools has never ever taught young Muslim boys and girls anything which has gone against the Islamic Law and the County Law. Islam has taught us to be fair and equal and never go against regardless of which religion. Islamic School teaches what a normal state school would teach. The Prophet Muhammad Peace be upon him said. “Beware!  Whoever is cruel and hard on a non-Muslim minority, or curtails their rights, or burdens them with more than they can bear, or takes anything from them against their free will; I (Prophet Muhammad) will complain against the person on the Day of Judgment.” (Abu Dawud)
attributes.background: Every year thousands of Muslim youngsters successfully graduate from Islamic Schools across the Nation. Many a times we have heard from the bad work of media that Islamic schools are teaching wrong things however this is not the case. Now as a team we all need to help and protect every school.
